description: Try our easy to follow Broccolini, Spinach & Avocado Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable soup,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Broccolini,Soy free,Avocado,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Broccolini, Spinach & Avocado Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes or until soft. Add broccolini, stock and 1 cup water. Increase heat to medium-high and simmer for 15 minutes or until tender. Add spinach and stir until wilted.
Remove from heat, add avocado flesh and parsley. Blend with a stick blender or in a food processor until smooth. Reheat gently over low heat, if needed. Top soup with feta and serve with lime halves.
